attributes.title: Among the Crowds
attributes.caption: Exploring CRWBY's use of crowd animation, software and lighting during the transition from Volume 5 to 6, and it's constant quest to improve the aesthetic and storytelling of the show.
attributes.description: Exploring CRWBY's use of crowd animation, software and lighting during the transition from Volume 5 to 6, and it's constant quest to improve the aesthetic and storytelling of the show.

attributes.title: The Magic of Character Creation
attributes.caption: From Concept to Animation and Visual FX, it takes a team to unleash the power of a magical genie.
attributes.description: From Concept to Animation and Visual FX, it takes a team to unleash the power of a magical genie.

attributes.title: Art of the Gods
attributes.caption: Dragons, Gods, and rigs - Rigging and the art of animating Gods and monsters.
attributes.description: Dragons, Gods, and rigs - Rigging and the art of animating Gods and monsters.

attributes.title: A Touch of Evil
attributes.caption: Animating and Storytelling from the villain's perspective.
attributes.description: Animating and Storytelling from the villain's perspective.

attributes.title: See, Think, Do
attributes.caption: Storytelling through intricate fight animation and choreography.
attributes.description: Storytelling through intricate fight animation and choreography.

attributes.title: Apathy Follows
attributes.caption: Team RWBY fights CRWBY's newest Grimm creation.
attributes.description: Team RWBY fights CRWBY's newest Grimm creation.

attributes.title: The Wonderful World of Merch
attributes.caption: T-shirts, toys, games, & more! Exploring the process behind RWBY merchandise and how it expands the world of RWBY.
attributes.description: T-shirts, toys, games, & more! Exploring the process behind RWBY merchandise and how it expands the world of RWBY.

attributes.title: Building Argus
attributes.caption: CRWBY's art team builds their most ambitious city yet - a hybrid of Atlas and Mistral.
attributes.description: CRWBY's art team builds their most ambitious city yet - a hybrid of Atlas and Mistral.

attributes.title: Suit Up!
attributes.caption: The animation team breaks down how they use motion capture performances to bring a scene to life.
attributes.description: The animation team breaks down how they use motion capture performances to bring a scene to life.

attributes.title: Render Wrangling
attributes.caption: The CRWBY tech team describes how they build and maintain the tools that allow our lighting and comp artists to create the final image.
attributes.description: The CRWBY tech team describes how they build and maintain the tools that allow our lighting and comp artists to create the final image.

attributes.title: Hey, Look at This! Script to Storyboard
attributes.caption: CRWBY's storyboard and camera artists visualize the script through thumbnails, storyboards, and staging maps to bring the director's vision to life.
attributes.description: CRWBY's storyboard and camera artists visualize the script through thumbnails, storyboards, and staging maps to bring the director's vision to life.
attributes.display_title: Hey, Look at This! Script to Storyboard

attributes.title: The Other 50%
attributes.caption: CRWBY's Audio team takes us through what it's like to use foley, sound design, and mix to add the texture that makes a fight larger than life.
attributes.description: CRWBY's Audio team takes us through what it's like to use foley, sound design, and mix to add the texture that makes a fight larger than life.

attributes.title: Focus & Communication
attributes.caption: How Producers and Directors help their teams succeed, and foster an environment of creativity, where RWBY comes first!
attributes.description: How Producers and Directors help their teams succeed, and foster an environment of creativity, where RWBY comes first!
